name: celtic song scarf
notes:
the celtic song scarf is a relaxing, simple to crochet scarf.  it features a beautiful texture of a fun block texture that is made up of the most basic stitches.  this is a lovely project for whipping up a quick gift, donating to a favorite charity, or treating yourself too!

need a little help? there's a full video tutorial too!

**this pattern is free on the blog (or you can purchase the ad-free pattern pdf here on ravelry!**
